The misleading article was published by: based magazine What Doctors Don’t Tell You on October 21, 2019.
The article: s headline states that the polio outbreak in the Philippines was caused by the vaccine, according to the World Health Organization (WHO).
The article references a statement from: leading to rare cases of polio.
The claim is contradicted by the WHO: s official stance, which states that low vaccination rates, not the vaccine itself, leave children more vulnerable to the poliovirus causing the outbreak in the Philippines.
